survey_brief: This survey aims to understand customer experiences and preferences regarding online grocery shopping services.

questions.question_text: How often do you shop for groceries online?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. Ensure the options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you shop for groceries online?

questions.question_text: Which online grocery platforms do you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which online grocery platforms do you use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an online grocery service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox with a limit of 3 selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with a max selection limit of 3.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an online grocery service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the freshness of groceries received from online orders?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction ratings. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the freshness of groceries received from online orders?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for online grocery shopping services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Provide a large text box.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for online grocery shopping services?

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced issues with delivery times?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question. Use radio buttons.

script.question_text: Have you ever experienced issues with delivery times?

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the issue(s) you encountered.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended follow-up question. Display only if Q6 is 'Yes'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT. Conditional display based on Q6 response.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the issue(s) you encountered.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your preferred online grocery service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for likelihood ratings. Ensure clear labeling.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your preferred online grocery service to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason for choosing online grocery shopping over in-store shopping?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with an 'Other' option for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with optional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason for choosing online grocery shopping over in-store shopping?

questions.question_text: How do you typically receive your grocery deliveries?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with an 'Other' option. Ensure all common delivery methods are covered.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with optional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How do you typically receive your grocery deliveries?
